casebody.data:
HOUSING AUTHORITY OF the TOWN OF GREENWICH
v.
Kenneth DESHOMMES Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 15, 2017

Kenneth Desormes, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Louis P. Pittocco, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 905, 150 A.3d 1192 (2016), is denied.
